titleStmt.title: [A treatise declaring and showing that images are not to be suffered in churches]
Einigerle Bild. English
titleStmt.author: Bucer, Martin, 1491-1551.
Bedrotus, Jacobus, d. 1541.
Marshall, William, fl. 1535.

notesStmt.note: Title page lacking; title suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Running title: That pictures nor ymages ought to be worshipped.
"Tr. by W. Marshall from the Latin trans. by J. Bedrote of M. Bucer's Das einigerle Bild"--STC (2nd ed.).
Publisher from colophon; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
